generated_body: The article likely provides an overview of the identification of a key aide to Russian President Vladimir Putin by investigators looking into the downing of the MH17 airliner. Readers can expect details about the aide's role in the Russian government and any implications this identification may have on international relations or ongoing investigations. The piece may also discuss the historical context of the MH17 incident and the reactions from various stakeholders, including the families of victims and government officials. Overall, it is likely to be an informative account that may touch upon the complexities of accountability in such international tragedies.
